channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ngn0sX2.png[/img][/CENTER]
[b][font=arial black][size=10pt]Divine-Realm is a 317 Economy server. The server is lead by mature & fully dedicated team. We have an awesome staff team who is always avaliable to help you. Divine-Realm offers you a widespread content all around the map featuring different Quests & Achivements to complete. At Divine-Realm , we even have fully working highscores for you to compete with other players. We strive for a perfect gaming experience & even the smallest details are important to us. Our key is to provide as bug-free and as enjoyable content as possible![/size][/font][/b] [size=18pt][font=arial black]Links -[/font][/size] [URL=http://"http://www.Divine-Realm .com"]Official Site[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.Divine-Realm .com"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.Divine-Realm .com/vote"]Vote for Divine-Realm[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.Divine-Realm .com/downloads/client.jar"]Download Client[/URL] [size=18pt][font=arial black]Key Features-[/font][/size] [B]- Features-[/B] Loading 602 Data with 474 Maps Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed F-Keys Zooming Highscores Vote System Auto Donate Awesome Donator benefit All skills working Active community Frequent Updates Stable / No Lag Quests Perfected Slayer system. Flawless combat Helpful & Active staff Full 63 Wave jad Good economy Good drop rates [B]- Bosses -[/B] Godwars KBD Dagannoths Kalphite Queen Corporal Beast Tormented Demons Chaos Elemental Barrelchest
[B]- Minigames -[/B] Duel Arena Barrows Fight Pits Fight Cave Ranging Guild Warriors Guild [SPOILER=Divine-Realm Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GIAlcDm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/56771888975992c9057e815be3ca8d68.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RrKZhUz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dJnvW5D.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zBbT74L.png[/img] [/SPOILER][/CENTER]

[CENTER][CENTER][/CENTER]

[font=arial black][size=10pt]Divine-Realm is a 317 Economy server. The server is lead by mature & fully dedicated team.
We have an awesome staff team who is always avaliable to help you.
Divine-Realm offers you a widespread content all around the map featuring different Quests & Achivements to complete.
At Divine-Realm , we even have fully working highscores for you to compete with other players.
We strive for a perfect gaming experience & even the smallest details are important to us.
Our key is to provide as bug-free and as enjoyable content as possible![/size][/font]
